body_html:
You are most welcomed.

Typically discrete GPUs have dedicated graphics memory. If I’m not mistaken, the 1050 Ti has 4 GB of GDDR5 memory. Although you have 16 GB of main memory for your host CPU, your GPU is limited to the available discrete memory. Since you are also driving a display, you probably have around 3.5 GB available for TensorFlow.

If this resolves your issue, you can go ahead and mark it as solved. If not, please let me know.

body:
You are most welcomed. 

Typically discrete GPUs have dedicated graphics memory. If I’m not mistaken, the 1050 Ti has 4 GB of GDDR5 memory. Although you have 16 GB of main memory for your host CPU, your GPU is limited to the available discrete memory. Since you are also driving a display, you probably have around 3.5 GB available for TensorFlow.

If this resolves your issue, you can go ahead and mark it as solved. If not, please let me know.
